languages.text: {n}Вы сталкивались со многими вариациями культа Бога-Императора, но, кажется, ни разу не слышали о посмертном перерождении. Такое учение весьма странно и экзотично даже для заштатной полузабытой планеты.{/n}

{n}You have encountered many variations of the God-Emperor's cult in your time, but never have you heard of reincarnation after death. A religious teaching such as this seems strange and exotic, even for a nondescript, half-forgotten planet like Thassera.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы сталкивались со многими вариациями культа Бога-Императора, но, кажется, ни разу не слышали о посмертном перерождении. Такое учение весьма странно и экзотично даже для заштатной полузабытой планеты.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You have known many variations of the God-Emperor's cult, but never have you heard of reincarnation after death. A religious teaching such as this seems strange and exotic even for a nondescript, half-forgotten planet.{/n}

{n}You have known many variations of the God-Emperor's cult, but never have you heard of reincarnation after death. A religious teaching such as this seems strange and exotic even for a nondescript, half-forgotten planet.{/n}

{n}You have encountered many variations of the God-Emperor's cult in your time, but never have you heard of reincarnation after death. A religious teaching such as this seems strange and exotic, even for a nondescript, half-forgotten planet like Thassera.{/n}

{n}You have encountered many variations of the God-Emperor's cult in your time, but never have you heard of reincarnation after death. A religious teaching such as this seems strange and exotic, even for a nondescript, half-forgotten planet like Thassera.{/n}

{n}You have encountered many variations of the God-Emperor's cult in your time, but never have you heard of reincarnation after death. A religious teaching such as this seems strange and exotic, even for a nondescript, half-forgotten planet like Thassera.{/n}

{n}You have encountered many variations of the God-Emperor's cult in your time, but never have you heard of reincarnation after death. A religious teaching such as this seems strange and exotic, even for a nondescript, half-forgotten planet like Thassera.{/n}

languages.text: {n}尽管你听说过许多崇拜帝皇的教派，对它们各自不同的教义也都有所耳闻，但你从来没听说过什么死后转世的说法。这样的教义实在是太古怪了，哪怕是像塔瑟拉这种毫不起眼、被人遗忘的世界，这样的教义也实在是过于离奇。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have encountered many variations of the God-Emperor's cult in your time, but never have you heard of reincarnation after death. A religious teaching such as this seems strange and exotic, even for a nondescript, half-forgotten planet like Thassera.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管你听说过许多崇拜帝皇的教派，对它们各自不同的教义也都有所耳闻，但你从来没听说过什么死后转世的说法。这样的教义实在是太古怪了，哪怕是像塔瑟拉这种毫不起眼、被人遗忘的世界，这样的教义也实在是过于离奇。{/n}

languages.text: {n}これまでの旅で神帝陛下の信仰にはさまざまな形があることを見てきたが、死後の転生について聞いたのはこれが初めてだ。このような宗教教義は、タッセーラのような目立たず忘れられかけた惑星であっても、奇妙で異国めいて感じられる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have encountered many variations of the God-Emperor's cult in your time, but never have you heard of reincarnation after death. A religious teaching such as this seems strange and exotic, even for a nondescript, half-forgotten planet like Thassera.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}これまでの旅で神帝陛下の信仰にはさまざまな形があることを見てきたが、死後の転生について聞いたのはこれが初めてだ。このような宗教教義は、タッセーラのような目立たず忘れられかけた惑星であっても、奇妙で異国めいて感じられる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}A lo largo de tus viajes te has topado con numerosas variantes del culto al Dios Emperador, pero nunca habías oído nada de la reencarnación. Tal creencia religiosa se te antoja peculiar y exótica incluso tratándose de un planeta atrasado y medio olvidado como Thassera.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have encountered many variations of the God-Emperor's cult in your time, but never have you heard of reincarnation after death. A religious teaching such as this seems strange and exotic, even for a nondescript, half-forgotten planet like Thassera.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A lo largo de tus viajes te has topado con numerosas variantes del culto al Dios Emperador, pero nunca habías oído nada de la reencarnación. Tal creencia religiosa se te antoja peculiar y exótica incluso tratándose de un planeta atrasado y medio olvidado como Thassera.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zamanında Tanrı İmparator inancının pek çok varyasyonuyla karşılaşmıştın ama ölümden sonra yeniden doğuşu hiç duymamıştın. Böyle bir dinî öğreti, Thassera gibi silik ve yarı unutulmuş bir gezegen için bile tuhaf ve egzotik kalıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have encountered many variations of the God-Emperor's cult in your time, but never have you heard of reincarnation after death. A religious teaching such as this seems strange and exotic, even for a nondescript, half-forgotten planet like Thassera.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zamanında Tanrı İmparator inancının pek çok varyasyonuyla karşılaşmıştın ama ölümden sonra yeniden doğuşu hiç duymamıştın. Böyle bir dinî öğreti, Thassera gibi silik ve yarı unutulmuş bir gezegen için bile tuhaf ve egzotik kalıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous avez croisé bien des variantes du culte de l'Empereur-Dieu au cours de votre existence, mais aucun n'a jamais professé la réincarnation. Cet enseignement religieux vous paraît étrange et exotique, même pour une planète banale et presque oubliée comme Thassera.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have encountered many variations of the God-Emperor's cult in your time, but never have you heard of reincarnation after death. A religious teaching such as this seems strange and exotic, even for a nondescript, half-forgotten planet like Thassera.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous avez croisé bien des variantes du culte de l'Empereur-Dieu au cours de votre existence, mais aucun n'a jamais professé la réincarnation. Cet enseignement religieux vous paraît étrange et exotique, même pour une planète banale et presque oubliée comme Thassera.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du bist schon vielen Varianten des Kults des Gottimperators begegnet, aber von Reinkarnation nach dem Tod hast du noch nie gehört. Eine derartige religiöse Lehre wirkt seltsam und exotisch, selbst für einen abgelegenen, fast vergessenen Planeten wie Thassera.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have encountered many variations of the God-Emperor's cult in your time, but never have you heard of reincarnation after death. A religious teaching such as this seems strange and exotic, even for a nondescript, half-forgotten planet like Thassera.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du bist schon vielen Varianten des Kults des Gottimperators begegnet, aber von Reinkarnation nach dem Tod hast du noch nie gehört. Eine derartige religiöse Lehre wirkt seltsam und exotisch, selbst für einen abgelegenen, fast vergessenen Planeten wie Thassera.{/n}
